name: Saurus Crackers
title: Saurus Crackers
desc: Crackers shaped like little Saurians. Light, crispy, sweet, and fragrant, with adorable patterns on top to boot â€” how could the people of Natlan not be won over by such delectable snacks?

skills.desc: During this Round, the target character will use 1 less Elemental Die the next time they use a Technique. (A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)
